data.what_is: 7Engage is an integrated all-in-one platform for you to interact with your customer. Enable you to chat with your customers on multi-channels, help you stay connected with customers by automation marketing, sort out effective leads without missing any business opportunity, and empower you with massive, personalized marketing ability to reach every one of your customers with precise content. Also, we help you analyze your customer's behavior and provide customer insight, empowering your sales, marketing, and support team to engage customers smoothly. Give your customers a better journey and help your brand form strong bonding with customers, improving customer loyalty.
data.product_description: 7Engage is an integrated all-in-one platform for you to interact with your customer. Enable you to chat with your customers on multi-channels, help you stay connected with customers by automation marketing, sort out effective leads without missing any business opportunity, and empower you with massive, personalized marketing ability to reach every one of your customers with precise content. Also, we help you analyze your customer's behavior and provide customer insight, empowering your sales, marketing, and support team to engage customers smoothly. Give your customers a better journey and help your brand form strong bonding with customers, improving customer loyalty.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about 7engage?
Loved how everything is well organized, the help section described everything perfectly.
Used it with my colleague

What do you dislike about 7engage?
Maybe needs more languages in order to be able to have it in many countries

What problems is 7engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
solving problems in marketing and reaching out to my colleagues
very fast during work
